Subjects: lechery; sinner, lament of; women, as speakers/narrators; women, erring
_description: Speech of a sinful woman who would not forgo her sin — two couplets

RylandsLat201.Transcription:
Wordely rychesse me haþ a-blendand lecherye me haþ
                    yschendFor hys loue þat dyde in treeuery man be war by
                    me
